# Nyssa Tasstani
## Overview
---
## Connections
Supervisor: [[Armse Broadnose]] ; Armse is an advisor to Nyssa.
General Family: [[Gorim the Boarslayer]] ; Gorim is the uncle of Nyssa.
General Family: [[Kraken King]] ; Nyssa is the granddaughter of the Kraken King.
General Family: [[Talinn Runewright]] ; Talinn is Nyssa's uncle.
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Ajinan]] ; Nyssa is the head of Ajinan.
Arbitrary Connection To: [[Villistine the Sea Dragon]] ; Villistine knows Nyssa.
Employer: [[Lonny]] ; Lonny works as a spy for Nyssa.
Child: [[Navid]] ; Navid is the father of Nyssa.
Resident: [[Ajinan]] ; Nyssa lives in Ajinan.
